products.name: AC Hard-wire Video Doorbel
specifications: Button/Switch|Power Switch x1, Reset Button x1

products.description: The AC Hard-wire Video Doorbell provides a secure and convenient way to monitor your home. Featuring a 2MP CMOS sensor and full HD 1080p video, it offers clear live view and recording capabilities.  Connect via Wi-Fi for remote viewing and control, or utilize the hard-wire AC 12-24V power source for a reliable power supply.  Integrated IR night vision ensures visibility in low-light conditions. Enjoy two-way audio communication with visitors, and deter potential intruders with a built-in siren alarm.  Advanced human and sound detection alerts you to activity. The IP65 weatherproof rating ensures durability in various weather conditions.  Local storage is available via a Micro SD card slot (up to 128GB), with optional cloud storage integration for enhanced security and accessibility.  An indoor chime provides audible notification upon doorbell press.  The 100-degree fixed focus lens captures a wide field of view.  The product includes a power switch and reset button for easy operation and maintenance.

products.name: 2K Video Doorbell
specifications: Audio Quality|Two-way Audio (Clear and Noise Reduction)
Security Features|Motion Detection, Human Detection, Package Detection, Tamper Alarm, Two-way Audio

products.description: The 2K Video Doorbell provides a secure and convenient way to monitor your home. Featuring crystal-clear 2K HD video at 1536x2048 resolution, this doorbell offers exceptional image quality for detailed viewing. The fixed 2.5mm lens provides a wide 170° diagonal field of view, capturing a comprehensive view of your entryway.  Advanced motion, human, and package detection algorithms alert you to activity, even when you're not home.  The included digital chime and app-based function settings allow for customized notifications and control.  Built-in Bluetooth LE and Wi-Fi connectivity enables seamless integration with your home network.  The IP65-rated design ensures durability and protection against the elements.  Powered by a long-lasting 5200mAh lithium battery, the doorbell offers extended operation.  A tamper alarm provides added security, alerting you to any unauthorized attempts to tamper with the device.  Easy to install and use, the 2K Video Doorbell is a valuable addition to any home.

products.description: The Solar Battery Camera provides reliable surveillance with its integrated solar panel for extended battery life. Featuring 2K/1080p live view, it captures clear footage even in low-light conditions.  The camera utilizes PIR motion detection to trigger recording and alerts, and can send notifications to your smartphone via Wi-Fi.  Built-in two-way audio allows for communication with individuals at the monitored location.  IR night vision ensures clear visibility in complete darkness.  A siren alarm deters potential intruders.  The camera is designed for outdoor use with an IP65 weatherproof rating, ensuring protection against dust and water.  The rechargeable battery provides power for extended monitoring periods, and the solar panel contributes to self-sufficiency.

products.name: Cube camera
products.description: The Cube Camera is a compact, high-performance surveillance camera designed for versatile applications. Featuring a 1/3" CMOS image sensor and a 4mm focal length lens, it delivers sharp, detailed images with a 2304x1296 resolution.  The camera boasts a 10-meter infrared (IR) illumination range for reliable night vision.  It supports both H.264 and MJPEG video compression for efficient storage and bandwidth management.  Integrated 2-way audio allows for remote communication and control.  Storage is facilitated via a microSD card slot supporting up to 128GB.  Powered by a DC 5V/1A power adapter, the Cube Camera offers reliable operation in various environments.

Featuring a built-in rechargeable lithium battery and solar power recharger, it offers continuous operation with minimal maintenance. Capture clear 2K/1080p video, both day and night, with infrared (IR) and color night vision. The camera is weatherproof (IP65) and includes a siren and light alarm for deterring intruders.  Local storage via Micro SD card (up to 128GB) is available, with optional cloud storage integration for remote access and backup.  Easy to install and use, the Battery Solar Spotlight Camera is an ideal solution for home and property security.

Featuring 2K/1080p live view and recording, this camera offers clear visuals day and night.  Utilizing dual-band Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz and 5 GHz), it ensures stable connectivity. products.description: The Outdoor Wi-Fi Battery Camera provides reliable surveillance for your home or property. Featuring a 2MP CMOS sensor and 1080p HD video, this camera offers clear live view and recording capabilities.  Utilizing 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connectivity (with optional 4G module for cellular backup), you can easily monitor your property remotely via a user-friendly mobile app.  Advanced features include both IR and color night vision for enhanced visibility in low-light conditions, a wide 100-degree lens for comprehensive coverage, and pan & tilt functionality for flexible viewing angles.  Enjoy two-way audio for communication and human detection with instant push notifications.  Power is supplied by a 6W solar panel and a high-capacity 7800mAh rechargeable battery, ensuring extended operation.  A built-in siren alarm deters potential intruders, and local storage is supported via a Micro SD card slot.  The IP65 weatherproof rating ensures durability in various outdoor conditions. Leveraging a 4G LTE network, it allows for remote monitoring and control from anywhere. Equipped with infrared (IR) night vision, it ensures clear visibility in low-light conditions. Two-way audio allows for communication with individuals in the monitored area. The camera utilizes human motion detection to trigger recording and notifications via the app. Local storage is supported via a Micro SD card slot, providing a secure and independent recording solution.  Built to withstand outdoor elements, the camera is weatherproof with an IP65 rating, ensuring durability in various environmental conditions.  It also features a built-in microphone for audio recording.

specifications: Screen|10.1-inch HD LCD Multi-touch Display (1920x1080 resolution)

products.description: The Control Panel MAX is a powerful and versatile smart control panel designed for seamless integration with a wide range of smart home devices. Featuring a vibrant 10.1-inch HD multi-touch display, it provides an intuitive interface for controlling lighting, climate, security systems, and more.  The integrated Zigbee and BLE Mesh gateways enable robust and reliable connectivity to numerous smart devices.  Users can control devices via a dedicated mobile application, voice commands (compatible with popular voice assistants), or through the built-in intercom system.  Four customizable physical buttons offer quick access to frequently used functions.  The panel supports a large number of Zigbee devices (128+) and offers a stable and secure wireless network connection.

products.name: Intelligent control panel
specifications: Functions|Tuya App Scanning & Binding, Lighting Control, Switch Control, Socket Control, AC Control, Curtain Control, Group Control
I/O Ports|1 Audio In, 1 Audio Out, 1 485 Out, 1 Timing Out
Media Support|TF Card, USB, Bluetooth Audio Playback
Security|Secure Boot, Data Encryption (Specify encryption type if applicable)
products.description: The Intelligent Control Panel is a versatile smart home hub designed for seamless integration with various smart devices. Featuring a user-friendly Android 11 interface and a responsive 4-inch capacitive touchscreen, it simplifies home automation. Control lighting, switches, sockets, AC units, and curtains with ease, and manage them in groups for centralized control. The panel utilizes the Zigbee protocol for robust and reliable wireless communication with a wide range of compatible devices. It offers flexible power options, supporting both AC 110-250V and 12V-24V DC power supplies.  Two relay channels with a combined load capacity of under 200W provide control over appliances.  Integrated I/O includes audio in/out, a 485 communication port, and a timing output for advanced automation scenarios. Bluetooth connectivity enables easy pairing with other devices.  The panel is designed for standard UK 86 bottom shell installation and boasts compact dimensions of 86x86x11mm.  Media playback is supported via TF card, USB, and Bluetooth audio streaming. Available in black and white color options.

Featuring a user-friendly Android 8.1 operating system, this panel provides intuitive control over various smart home devices, customizable scenes, and background music playback. Its robust hardware ensures reliable performance, while the compact UK standard 86 bottom shell facilitates easy installation.  The integrated audio output and I/O ports offer flexibility for connecting external devices and systems.  The panel is designed for power efficiency and compatibility with a wide range of smart home ecosystems.

specifications: Battery Life|10 years|Typical battery life, dependent on usage.  Battery type: CR2032 (or equivalent).

Operating Temperature| -10°C to +55°C|Suitable for use in a wide range of ambient temperatures.
Operating Humidity|10%-95%RH|Operational within a broad humidity range.
Transmission Frequency|2.4GHz|Utilizes the 2.4GHz ISM band for reliable wireless communication.

Alarm Sound Pressure|70dB(1m ahead)|Audible alarm sound pressure level at 1 meter distance.
Detected Gas|Natural Gas (Methane)|Specifically designed to detect methane gas.
Gas Detection Range|Up to 1000 ppm (parts per million)|Indicates the concentration of natural gas.
Sensor Type|Electrochemical|Utilizes electrochemical sensor technology for accurate gas detection.
Response Time| < 10 seconds|Rapid response to gas detection.
Operating Pressure Range| 0-10000 kPa|Measures natural gas concentration within a specified pressure range.
Certifications|CE, FCC, RoHS|Complies with relevant safety and environmental standards.
Data Logging|Yes|Records gas concentration readings for historical analysis.
Communication Protocol|ZigBee 3.0|Supports the latest ZigBee communication standards for improved performance and security.
products.description: The Smart Gas Sensor provides comprehensive natural gas detection and alerts, offering peace of mind for homes and businesses. Featuring a sleek, minimalist design and long-lasting battery life, this sensor seamlessly integrates into any environment. It utilizes ZigBee wireless technology for reliable communication and offers multiple alarm options – local audible and visual alerts, and remote notifications via a dedicated mobile application.  The sensor is designed for easy installation on ceilings or walls and is built to withstand a wide range of environmental conditions. It is a crucial component for ensuring safe and healthy living spaces.

products.description: The Smart Radiator Valve is a smart thermostat designed for precise and convenient control of your radiator heating system. It offers comprehensive functionality including app control, voice control integration, stroke distance detection for accurate temperature adjustment, and open window detection to prevent energy waste.  The valve utilizes Zigbee 3.0 for a stable and low-power wireless connection, ensuring reliable operation within your smart home ecosystem.  It features an NTC temperature sensor for accurate readings and is equipped with anti-freeze protection to safeguard against freezing temperatures.  The valve is easily programmable to create customized heating schedules, optimizing comfort and energy efficiency.  It is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Home voice assistants.  The valve is designed for easy installation with an M30*1.5mm connection.

This compact, plug-and-play logger seamlessly integrates with a wide range of inverter brands, offering real-time insights into operational status and energy production.  It facilitates remote monitoring and data logging, enabling proactive maintenance and optimized energy management.  The Stick Logger is ideal for residential, commercial, and industrial applications, providing valuable data for energy audits, performance analysis, and troubleshooting.

This controller offers multiple control methods including a dedicated touch panel, smartphone app control, and voice control integration with Alexa and Google Assistant.  It allows for intelligent scheduling to optimize energy consumption and comfort.  The controller features a clear LCD display for easy monitoring of temperature and humidity.  It's designed for seamless integration into modern smart home ecosystems.

products.name: Residential Single-Phase Hybrid inverter
specifications: Feature|Value: Robust backup power output capacity, ensuring continuous power supply during grid failures.

Feature|Value: Reliable IP65 rating for outdoor use, providing protection against dust and water ingress.

Feature|Value: Max. solar input: 7KW, capable of handling a significant portion of residential energy needs.

Feature|Value: Output Voltage: 230VAC, 50/60Hz, standard residential voltage.

Feature|Value: Display: LCD screen with real-time power monitoring, system status, and error messages.

products.description: The Residential Single-Phase Hybrid Inverter is a robust and reliable solution for providing backup power and optimizing solar energy harvesting for residential applications. This inverter seamlessly integrates solar power with the utility grid, offering a stable power supply even during grid outages. It features a wide MPPT voltage range and high solar input capacity, ensuring efficient energy conversion. Designed for outdoor use, the IP65 rating guarantees protection against dust and water ingress.  The inverter's robust design and parallel operation capabilities allow for scalability to meet growing energy demands.  It's a key component in a smart home energy management system, enabling users to monitor and control their energy consumption and maximize the benefits of renewable energy.

products.description: The Balcony Energy Storage system is a compact, smart solution for residential solar energy storage. This Home-ESS grade system utilizes a high-capacity Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) battery to store excess solar energy generated on your balcony, allowing you to utilize it during periods of low sunlight or at night.  It features an integrated Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) controller for optimal solar panel performance, direct PV input for seamless integration with solar panels, and easy plug-and-play MC4 connectors for simplified installation. The system is designed for easy commissioning and provides a reliable backup power source.  With its IP65 rating, it's built to withstand outdoor conditions.  The expandable capacity allows for customization to meet varying energy needs, and the robust LFP battery offers a long lifespan.  This system is ideal for homeowners seeking to reduce reliance on the grid and promote energy independence.

products.description: The Smart Hi-Fi Karaoke System is a powerful and versatile entertainment hub designed for family gatherings and personalized musical enjoyment. Featuring a responsive Android 8.1 operating system, this system delivers a seamless user experience with access to a vast library of music, karaoke tracks, and streaming services.  High-fidelity audio reproduction is achieved through Yamaha-engineered 8 x 20W speakers, providing rich bass and clear vocals.  The system supports multiple input sources, including HDMI, Bluetooth, USB, and TF cards, offering flexibility for diverse playback needs.  The built-in 485 bidirectional control allows for remote management and integration with other smart home devices.  Its compact, customized bottom box design ensures a clean and aesthetically pleasing setup.  Available in white and black, this system is ideal for home entertainment and karaoke sessions.

Featuring a user-friendly Android 8.1 interface, it offers seamless control over a wide range of audio sources. The console boasts a vibrant 4-inch IPS capacitive touchscreen for intuitive navigation and playback.  It supports multiple audio formats via TF card and USB, and can be integrated into existing audio systems via 485 control.  The two integrated 10-20W speakers deliver rich, clear sound.  The console is designed for easy installation in standard UK 86 boxes and is powered by a reliable AC adapter. Available in white and black finishes.

products.description: The 5-inch High Fidelity Ceiling Horn is a passive speaker designed for optimal background music reproduction in commercial and residential settings. This speaker delivers a clear and detailed soundstage with a focus on balanced frequency response and extended dynamic range. The horn design enhances directivity and reduces unwanted reflections, ensuring consistent sound quality throughout the listening area.  It features a 2-way driver configuration with a black fiberglass horn and a 25-core black silk dome tweeter, providing a smooth transition between high and mid-frequency ranges.  The speaker is built for durability and long-term performance, offering a robust and aesthetically pleasing solution for ceiling-mounted audio systems.

products.description: The 4-Gang Scene Switch (PC) is a versatile smart switch designed for enhanced home automation. This device allows for the control of up to four distinct scenes, each dedicated to a specific function like road lighting or street lamp operation.  It operates with zero live wire installation, offering a safe and convenient upgrade to your existing electrical system.  Leveraging ZigBee 3.0 connectivity, it seamlessly integrates with a wide range of smart home ecosystems and platforms.  The switch features intuitive button control, a bright backlight for easy operation in low-light conditions, and intelligent human body sensing for automated activation.  Control is accessible through a user-friendly mobile application (APP) and voice assistants.  Built-in timing and countdown features provide granular control over scene activation and deactivation. Constructed from flame-retardant PC material, this switch is designed for durability and safety. Available in a range of stylish colors – white, black, gold, and gray – it complements any décor.

products.description: The Smart Switch (PC) is a versatile smart home control device designed for seamless integration with your existing home automation system. This switch offers comprehensive control over various smart devices, including street lamps, lighting, and window coverings. It utilizes ZigBee 3.0 connectivity for reliable and low-power communication, ensuring stable control and extended battery life.  The switch features a user-friendly interface with button control, backlight illumination for easy operation in low-light conditions, and intelligent human body sensing for automated operation.  Control is accessible via a dedicated mobile application (APP) and compatible with popular voice assistants. Built with flame-retardant PC material, this switch provides enhanced safety and durability.  It is compatible with a wide range of devices and offers flexible scene creation for customized automation.

products.description: The Smart Dimmer Switch (PC) offers convenient and energy-efficient control for two distinct lighting scenarios, such as different streetlights or customized road scene lighting.  Designed for ease of installation, it operates with zero live wire requirements and supports a wide AC voltage range.  Leveraging ZigBee 3.0 connectivity, it seamlessly integrates with popular smart home ecosystems and allows for intuitive control via a dedicated mobile application, voice assistants, and physical button controls.  The switch features a user-friendly interface with backlight illumination for easy operation in low-light conditions.  Enhanced with human body sensing, it can automatically adjust brightness based on occupancy.  Available in a range of stylish finishes, the switch is constructed from durable PC material.

products.description: The ZIGBEE Intelligent Thermostat is a smart switch designed to provide comprehensive control over your home's climate. It seamlessly integrates with ZigBee 3.0 networks for reliable and low-power communication with compatible smart home hubs. This device offers convenient control of fresh air, floor heating, and air conditioning systems, all from a single, user-friendly interface.  Featuring a sleek aluminum panel and PC shell construction, the thermostat boasts a durable and aesthetically pleasing design.  The CNC hardware anodized shell provides enhanced protection and a premium feel.  The intuitive button control, combined with a bright backlight, ensures ease of use in any lighting conditions.  Advanced human body induction technology allows for hands-free operation.  Control your thermostat effortlessly through the dedicated mobile application (iOS & Android) or via voice assistants (Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant).  The zero live wire design simplifies installation and eliminates electrical hazards.  Its compact size (86x86x35mm) allows for easy integration into standard electrical boxes.

products.name: Tuya wifi Smart power strip
specifications: Product Name|Tuya WiFi Smart Power Strip
Total Power Output|Up to 400W (across all outlets)
Fast Charging Support|QC2.0, QC3.0, PD2.0, PD3.0, PPS, AFC, FCP, Apple 2.4A, Samsung 2A, BC 1.2
Safety Features|Overload Protection, Over-voltage Protection, Short-circuit Protection
products.description: The Tuya WiFi Smart Power Strip is a versatile smart outlet designed to simplify power management and enhance convenience. This power strip features four AC outlets and three USB ports (USB-A and USB-C), offering flexible power distribution for various devices.  It supports a wide range of fast charging protocols for smartphones, tablets, and other USB-powered devices.  Control your power strip remotely via the Tuya Smart App, schedule power on/off times, and monitor energy consumption.  Built with a durable, fire-resistant PC+ABS casing, this power strip is designed for safety and long-lasting performance.  The 2.4GHz WiFi connectivity ensures reliable and stable connection to your home network.

Smart DIY Module.name: Smart DIY Module

products.name: TUYA Zigbee
specifications: Communication Range| Up to 100 meters (Zigbee), 80 meters (Wi-Fi)
Package Contents| TUYA Zigbee Smart DIY Module, Mounting Hardware, User Manual
products.description: The TUYA Zigbee Smart DIY Module is a compact and versatile solution for creating custom smart home automations. This module enables seamless integration with TUYA Smart Home platform, allowing users to control various devices through a mobile app. It supports both Zigbee and Wi-Fi connectivity, providing flexibility in network setup. The module is designed for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike, offering a simple way to add smart functionality to existing appliances and devices. Its small size and lightweight design make it ideal for discreet installation.

products.name: TUYA Zigbee
specifications: Mounting Type|Suitable for various mounting options (e.g., DIN rail, panel mount)
Communication Range| Up to 100 meters (328 feet) in open air
Security| Supports secure communication protocols (e.g., TLS/SSL)
Installation| Easy to install with standard wiring
Protection Rating| IP20 (Protection against solid objects larger than 1mm)
products.description: The TUYA Zigbee Smart DIY Module is a compact and versatile solution for creating custom smart home automations. This module enables seamless integration with TUYA Smart Home ecosystem and supports a wide range of DIY projects. It offers flexible power options and easy installation, making it ideal for both beginners and experienced users.  The module utilizes a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connection for control and is designed for easy integration with other smart devices.  Its small size and lightweight design allow for discreet placement within various environments.

products.name: tuya Zigbee,1ch
specifications: Wireless Range|Up to 100 meters (line of sight)
Compatibility|Tuya Smart Platform, Compatible with other Zigbee hubs
Installation|Requires Zigbee hub and compatible smart switch
products.description: The Tuya Zigbee 1-Channel Smart DIY Module is a compact and versatile solution for creating customized smart home automations. This module enables you to control a single AC device (up to 10A or 16A depending on the model) through a user-friendly mobile application. Its miniature design allows for discreet installation in various DIY projects, seamlessly integrating with your existing smart home ecosystem.  It utilizes Zigbee communication for reliable and low-power operation, offering enhanced security and privacy compared to Wi-Fi based solutions.  The module is designed for easy integration with a wide range of smart home platforms and is ideal for controlling lights, appliances, and other compatible devices.
